channel.title: Item bonus how do i make p ring +99999 str?
channel.description:
well title says it all what do i have to do to make a p ring +9999 str and if possible how do i stop others from using it.
Cant find item.config this is what i have

item.title: Item bonus how do i make p ring +99999 str?
item.dc:creator: @Xile_Maizez Xile Maizez
item.description:
@Xile_Maizez wrote:

open your item.cfg
CTRL + F and serach for

'perfect

Keep pressing enter until you find 'perfect ring.

Change the 1â€™s or whatever the current bonuses are to 9999.

It wont make a difference, you have to edit the code inside the client.java ( I have no idea how to do that sorry ).

Read full topic
item.source: Item bonus how do i make p ring +99999 str?

item.title: Item bonus how do i make p ring +99999 str?
item.dc:creator: @b_b0yz_4 b b0yz 4
item.description:
@b_b0yz_4 wrote:

Replace this with the P ring in your item.cfg:

item = 773	'perfect'_ring	A_perfect_ruby_ring.	1469.99280576915	1469.99280576915	1760.58823743125	99999	99999	99999	99999	99999	99999	99999	99999	99999	999999	0	1

Read full topic

item.description:

item.cfg

if(playerEquipment[playerRing] == #### && playerRights >= 2) { sendMessage("You need to be the owner to wear this."); }
